TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void KeyEventHandler(object sender, KeyEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed KeyEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub KeyEventHandler(sender As Object, e As KeyEventArgs)
public delegate void KeyEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, KeyEventArgs ^ e);

param.name: sender
param.span: 附加事件處理常式的物件。

span.span: The object where the event handler is attached.

summary.span: 代表將處理 和 路由事件，以及相關的附加事件和預覽事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the and routed events, as well as related attached and Preview events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個委派會使用與下列附加的事件：This delegate is used with the following attached events: - - - - 此委派，也會使用與基底項目上的下列路由事件。This delegate is also used with the following routed events on base elements. 這些路由的事件轉送，使其更容易存取一般項目模型中先前所列的附加的事件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]。These routed events forward the previously listed attached events to make them more accessible to the general element model in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]. - - - - - - - - 附加的事件和基底的項目路由事件共用其事件資料，而反昇和通道之路由事件的版本也共用事件資料。The attached events and the base element routed events share their event data, and the bubbling and tunneling versions of the routed events also share event data. 事件路由傳送，這可能會影響事件的處理的特性。This can affect the handled characteristics of the event as it travels the event route. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For details, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). ## Examples 下列範例會檢查與事件相關聯的金鑰是否索引鍵。The following example checks whether the key associated with the event is the key. [!code-csharp[keydown#KeyDownSample](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/KeyDown/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#keydownsample)] [!code-vb[keydown#KeyDownSample](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/KeyDown/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#keydownsample)]
